Module io.github.darvil.lanat
Package io.github.darvil.lanat.argtypes

Class NumberArgumentType<T extends Number>

java.lang.Object
io.github.darvil.lanat.utils.errors.ErrorContainerImpl<ArgumentTypeError>
io.github.darvil.lanat.ArgumentType<T>
io.github.darvil.lanat.argtypes.NumberArgumentType<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of number that this argument type is.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Parseable<T>, ErrorContainer<ArgumentTypeError>, NamedWithDescription, ParentElementGetter<ArgumentType<?>>, PostCreationInheritor<Command>, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteArgumentType, DoubleArgumentType, FloatArgumentType, IntegerArgumentType, LongArgumentType, ShortArgumentType
public abstract class NumberArgumentType<T extends Number> extends ArgumentType<T>
An abstract class for argument types that are numbers. This class provides an implementation of parseValues(String[]) that will parse the first argument as a number using the function returned by getParseFunction().
See Also:

    • getParseFunction

      @NotNull protected abstract @NotNull Function<@NotNull String,@NotNull T> getParseFunction()
      Returns the function that will parse a string as a number. e.g. Integer.parseInt(String).
      Returns:
      The function that will parse a string as a number.

    • parseValues

      public T parseValues(@NotNull @NotNull String @NotNull [] values)
      Description copied from interface: Parseable
      Parses the received values and returns the result. If the values are invalid, this method shall return null.
      Parameters:
      values - The values that were received.
      Returns:
      The parsed value.
